programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: MALAI KAM CHAI
programme.desc: Shantappa, a coconut seller has put his stall right next to hotel California. Sundar attracts customers by showing his antics. However, things change when Basha meddles in and joins the rival party. Soon the healthy competition turns into unending events of nuisance where the customers from both the stalls have to bear the brunt.

programme.title: All Through the House
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Treasure Map Adventure
programme.desc: The Super Six and Sneevil race to find a hidden treasure over land and sea, facing obstacles along the way. When they enter the Smightymuda Triangle, things get even rockier and wild. Who will make it out and find the treasure first?

programme.title: Rest
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Turn the Paige
programme.desc: Paige Turner is the head librarian at the old Alexander Tyler Poe library. Paige is dedicated, helpful, and very sweet. But when a a mysterious Green Mist appeared one fateful Halloween night, things changed forever at the old library. Find out what strange and creepy things happened to Paige, the janitor, and a forgotten bag of candy!

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: NeverGiveUp
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: ROYAL-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is all a flutter his little tea shop is going to host a very special guest- the namboodhiri (the local cheiftain)and his adamant and pampered daughter to the teashop. Basha turns up and his acrobatics impress the little daughter and she insists that he sit with her.Sundar is appalled as Basha milks this development to the fullest and bosses Sundar around as if indeed he were a royal pet. Sundars attempts to oust Basha end in tea slopping over the prince or fruits splooshing on his daughters hairdo. Chai Raja immediately forbids Sundar from any more mischief. Sundar tries to ignore Basha but Basha makes things worse by setting up Sundar and making Chai Raja even angrier. The worst comes when Chai Raja is to be bestowed an honour by the prince and Basha causes Sundar to crash into the trophy busting it up. Chai Raja loses it and Sundar gets triple chores....but there is a smile on his face. For the daughter turns out to be a stubborn brat who insists that the monkey (Basha) be her pet and Basha is dragged away, fists banging as he is smothered with suffocating kisses by the daughter.

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Sneevil Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: GUILLI DANDA
programme.desc: It is a busy day in Hotel Kelifornia and Sundar is busy serving the customer; when a guilli comes and fall on his plate destroying everything. Sundar comes out to see a totally oblivious and excited Basha playing guilli danda with a few kids. Sundar has a mean idea and he innocently joins them in the game. It is his turn to hit the guilli and he intentionally hit is towards Basha who innocently takes it in the spirit. The kids laugh. Sundar does this the second time also. This time the kids laugh and Sundar laughs falling on to the ground. And Sundar runs to the shop with a cheeky laugh like a victor. Basha wants to give it back to Sundar big times. And he decides to play rough. The hotel then faces crazy hits of guillis on food plates, on customers, on Chai Rajas kettle and on Sundars butt. And whenever Chai Raja turns around to see what is going on, Basha makes sure that the guilli ends up in Sundars mouth. The charade gets so crazy that in the end the guilli comes and hits hard on Chai Rajas head. An angry Chai Raja turns around and Sundar quickly pulls Chai Raja to the door to show Basha and gang playing. Basha and the kids freeze seeing Chai Raja with a huge bump on his head holding the guilli. Sundar is excitedly waiting. The next moment Chai Raja takes out his belan and hits the guilli with a smile and joins the team in the game. It is game time and Sundar faints in shock

programme.title: Bun For The Road
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in a sprightly mood, his head zinging with ideas for a fresh menu but just as he is about to jot them on the blackboard, a throat clears behind him. Chai Raja turns to find a beaming salesman selling buns who wants Chai Raja to take a trial batch of his buns. Chai Raja doesnt much care for the pushy salesman from the start, but really loses his temper when the salesman implies that his buns are better than Chai Rajas fritters. An incensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to take care of the salesman so that he himself can get on with the days menu, as customers have started coming. Sundar immediately gets his guard face on and sends the salesman scuttling though little does he know that the stubborn guy has snuck back into the yard and is keeping an eye out for an opportunity to thrust his trial buns in Chai Rajas face. The salesman spots Basha neatly outwitting Sundar and decides to recruit the latter to worm his way into Chai Rajas presence- the salesman wants to prove his point and force Chai Raja to buy his buns. Basha expecting fritters as payment accepts and gets to work distracting Sundar. The salesman sneaks in and starts switching the snacks and soon Chai Raja faces foul-tempered customers who point at their plates in protest. Sundar is immediately summoned and given an earful- a confused Sundar suddenly spots the lurking salesman and realizes who the saboteur is. A chase ensues made hilarious by Bashas intervention that Chai Raja ends by landing a griddle splat on the salesmans hindquarters and sending him flying. Basha is left fritter-less but then spots the suitcase of buns that the salesman dropped

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Old Luggage
programme.desc: Packed with fun DIYs, Hepi and Briko tak us on an adventure!

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: The gift
programme.desc: Yo, Yo, Ragoo and the young boy Theo are invited to Pandora, the princess’s party. Theo’s allergic to peanuts, but, not knowing, Pandora’s made a peanut butter cake for him.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Socks
programme.desc: Not just to keep your feet warm, Hepi and Briko have some interesting sock themed ideas

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: The tale of a toad
programme.desc: The twins help a toad who is rejected because he is so ugly.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: The Golden Key_Based On Hansel & Gretel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Hansel and Gretel”, called by the WITCH. The magic key to her larder, in which she is holding HANSEL and GRETEL prisoner, has disappeared. SANDRA will have to find the key and deceive the WITCH, in order to be able to help the little brother and sister escape

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: More than a Mouthful
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: Boredom Blues
programme.desc: Brains is bored. Fred helps her find something new to do, and she falls in love with tennis! While she’s away, Fred opens a box of what he thinks are toys, but are actually a real army of small alien ships, which fly around attacking the lab. Brains combats them in a tennis racquet battle to the finish.

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: The Emperor Comes to Town
programme.desc: The Emperor of China is coming to town and the people of Baghdad are tasked to put on their best show as he passes through the market. Genie is thrilled, what talent shall he put on to impress the Emperor? Jamillah has a great idea for a circus act, and she asks them both to help her do a running cartwheel only they all fall over when they try in front of the Emperor and a very angry Grand Vizier. Just when hes about to send them all to jail however, the Emperor chuckles, he thinks its all hilarious! As a prize he invites them all to dine with him and the Sultan.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls "bigness" that helps save the day.

programme.title: Nunca me digas adiós
programme.desc: Kate y Timothy se reencuentran tras 12 años, pero una mujer envidiosa busca conquistar a Tim a toda costa.

programme.title: Nunca me digas adiós
programme.desc: Kate y Timothy se reencuentran tras 12 años, pero una mujer envidiosa busca conquistar a Tim a toda costa.

programme.title: Rompiendo las reglas
programme.desc: Román va a prisión por fraudes financieros y su esposa está rompiendo todas las reglas para sacarle de allí.

programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Play Safe -1936
programme.desc: A little boy jumps on a real train and learns a lesson about safety.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: Little Lambkin- 1940
programme.desc: A precocious toddler, wanting to return to his watermelon patch and a pair of animal friends in the country, tampers with the electronic gadgets in his new city home and creates chaos.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: Dog Gone South 1950
programme.desc: Ever in search of a master, no matter how unwilling, Charlie winds up on a plantation down South and tries to force himself on the owner, a Confederate Colonel. Unfortunately, the Colonel already has a pet bulldog, "Belvedere."

programme.title: Betty Boop- Whoops! I'm a Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop's runt of a suitor thinks he'll have better luck if he takes cowboy lessons at a dude ranch; slapstick results.

programme.title: A Date to Skate
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: popeye meets ali baba's forty thieves (1080)
Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Meet John Doe- 1941
programme.desc: A penniless drifter (Gary Cooper) is recruited by an ambitious columnist (Barbara Stanwyck) to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

programme.title: The Inspector General 1949
programme.desc: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise.

programme.title: Kid Auto Races at Venice -1914
programme.desc: The Tramp wanders into and disrupts the filming of a go-kart race.

programme.title: Safety Last!1923
programme.desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
Boss of Rawhide 1943
programme.desc: In the 8th film of the 22-film series, Texas Rangers Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins are sent to the district of Rawhide to investigate the killings of several ranchers. Tex enters the town posing as a tramp while the other two Rangers join a troupe of itinerant minstrels. Tex, convinced that while they may find the killer, it will not prevent further harassment of the poorer ranchers, and he returns to the Ranger station and persuades his father, Texas Ranger Captain John Wyatt, to take a leave of absence and go to Rawhide and run for Land Commissioner. Tex and his father meet Henry Colby, the wealthiest landholder in the district, who has been advised by his ranch foreman, Frank Hade, and Sam Barrett, the boss of Rawhide, that the nesters are the cause of all the lawlessness. At a meeting, preceded by the dullest, most demeaning minstrel show ever filmed, Captain Wyatt is shot (a fate that should have befallen the minstrels) and the bullet is found to be the same caliber as that used in the earlier killings, although Wyatt is only wounded. Mary Colby, riding the range, sees Barrett attempt to kill Tex using a rifle. Realizing he has been identified, Barrett hurries back to town where he meets the other gang members, and they prepare to fight against the Rangers

programme.title: Buffalo Bill, Jr. S1E8 The Rain Wagon
programme.desc: During a drought that has hit Wileyville, crops are failing and tempers are soaring high. This drought brings two men with a Rain Maker to the town. During a demonstration, the express office is robbed and an innocent farmer is blamed. Buffalo Bill Jr. and his sis, Calamity set out to find the real villains.

programme.title: Lost Ranch 1937.
programme.desc: Cattlemen's Protective Association agent Tom Wade and his partner Happy are assigned to look into the disappearance of rancher John Carroll, who has been abducted by Carson, who wants to use his out-of-the-way ranch as a base for his smuggling operations. Complications arise as Carrol's daughter, Rita, looking for him, has an unfriendly run-in with Wade, then later is herself kidnapped by Carson

programme.title: CITY TOUR - " PUNTA DEL ESTE" CON GRACIELA ALFANO (Invitada Especial)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Leo Saleh y a la icónica Graciela Alfano en un exclusivo recorrido por Punta del Este en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: Guest Alphonso David
programme.desc: Alphonso David, President & CEO of ‪the Global Black Economic Forum,‬ talks President‬ Trump's tariffs, the elimination of DEI and the socio-economic future of Black America.

programme.title: Guests Niya Ameras, Janiah Slaughter, Tamika Smith
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Niya Ameras, Janiah Slaughter and Tamika Smith, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Eric Hall
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Eric Hall talks new music, touring with Beyonce and Mary J. Blige, and the current state of the music industry.

programme.title: Guests Bella Bliss, Shanti, Noell Webber
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Capricorn and Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Guest Raquel Willis
programme.desc: Raquel Willis is a major trans activist and the author of a powerful memoir called The Risk It Takes To Bloom. We dive deep into what it means to be trans from her coming out to her politics to her dating life. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: The Kids Know
programme.desc: Thomas and Melody meet up with Vegan Evan, a leading young animal activist!

programme.title: What Your Spicy Vegans Eat in a Day!
programme.desc: This video will make you declare... I'll have what they're having. What they eat in a day? A feast!

programme.title: The Land Of Ahimsa
programme.desc: The granddaughter of a Gandhi freedom fighter returns to India pleading for a renewal of Ahimsa!

programme.title: Ranch Rescue - Storming to Safety!
programme.desc: A Texas ranch turned vegan sanctuary faces a deadly storm—can they save their beloved animals ?

programme.title: Susan Pratt Reveals Cactus Magic!
programme.desc: How to make Cactus Soy Curls, inspired by Ave's chic cactus bag

programme.title: Fascinating Fashionista!
programme.desc: Emma Hakansson is an ethical fashion leader who makes her case with captivating style!

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A supernatural stalker pursues a super model to steal her soul with his demonic camera...

programme.title: The Mermaid's Curse
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with a seductive, sultry, young woman he meets on the beach. The more he falls for her, the more he will learn the dangers of falling in love with a siren...

programme.title: Ditch Day
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, a high school senior, is the perfect student, a wonderful daughter to a veteran police detective and an all American Dream. But the one mistake she is unaware of making is about to haunt her in a very violent way, as her past returns for revenge...

programme.title: Poltergeist Americano
programme.desc: Horribles visiones atormentan a Taryn cuando ella, su hermano y sus compañeros de universidad se mudan a una vieja e infame casa. Entonces, sus sangrientas alucinaciones se vuelven demasiado reales...

programme.title: Isla de las Muñecas
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas va a la legendaria Isla de las Muñecas para conocer la verdad mortal...

programme.title: El Mal Interior
programme.desc: Un chico solitario y mentalmente discapacitado se hace amigo de su reflejo en un espejo antiguo. Esta criatura demoníaca le ordena que se lance a una matanza asesina de las personas que más quiere...

programme.title: El Motero
programme.desc: Los Morales son una familia numerosa de padre y madre hijos que se dedican a los sembradíos de marihuana. En la familia hay dos hermanos Edgar, quien siempre ayuda a su familia y Gustavo quien es envidioso y no ayuda a su familia. Los Cortes quienes son competencia de Los Morales en sembradíos de Marihuana, un día se encuentran a Gustavo Morales en un bar y se aprovechan de el diciéndole que el es el mero fregón de su familia en los negocios. Los Cortes utilizan a Gustavo para que les ponga el dedo a su propia familia para que todo les salga mal y pierdan sus mercancías durante sus trasportes.

programme.title: Cigarrito Bañado
programme.desc: Lucio huye de una deuda y un amigo peligroso. En su andar encuentra a Ximena, una bella mujer que seduce a los hombres más poderosos para después robarles su dinero. Ambos se unen para dar un gran golpe. Gran Película basada en el corrido de "El Komander"

programme.title: Asalto al Cine
programme.desc: La policía toma por asalto un espacio donde grupos de jóvenes se reúnen, El Negus, el Chale, el Sapo y la Chata, logran escapar, viendo cerrarse las puertas del Faro detrás suyo. Cuatro jóvenes amigos, en una unidad habitacional de la colonia guerrero, se aburren esperando evadir sus conflictos personales. Un día como cualquier otro, deciden asaltar un cine, con la esperanza de encontrar en esto una salida a su monotonía; pero en cambio sólo encuentran acelerar su choque con la realidad y terminan por volver al mismo sitio: una banca de la unidad.

programme.title: Aerosol
programme.desc: El líder de una banda mexicana mata a un oponente en la guerra de pandillas en los 80's, por lo que huye a la ciudad de Los Ángeles, California. Dieciocho años después regresa al barrio sin un objetivo definido, sólo para encontrar a su hermano menor, involucrado en las pandillas de hoy. El crimen organizado utiliza niños para distribuir droga en los barrios. En combatir la corrupción y el crimen que hay en el barrio, Nuk encuentra un significado para su retorno y un camino para redimir las muertes que causó

programme.title: Borrar de la Memoria
programme.desc: Una historia de amor se transforma en una historia de persecuciones y asesinatos sin esclarecer en el contexto de la masacre estudiantil de octubre de 1968. Más de 40 años después, un periodista tenaz se da a la tarea de aclarar los crímenes bajo condiciones muy peligrosas, con el objetivo de llevar la verdad ante la justicia. Ello representa un esfuerzo dedicado a obligar a un país a reconocer la negación de la reconciliación y el cierre de trágicos acontecimientos políticos y sociales en su historia.

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: Las Vegas Frankenstein
programme.desc: Después de un traumático accidente durante las vacaciones, cinco amigos cometen el error fatal de deshacerse del cuerpo de su víctima. Pero exactamente un año después, alguien o algo ha vuelto en busca de venganza y busca algo más que una disculpa.

programme.title: Bestia: Un Mounstro Entre Los Hombres
programme.desc: Cinco amigos se van de escapada a una cabaña aislada en las afueras del Bosque Nacional Six Rivers. Una discusión separa al grupo y las cosas comienzan a deteriorarse rápidamente. A medida que avanza la noche, aumentan las tensiones y es evidente que las cosas no son lo que parecen. La pregunta que cada hombre debe hacerse ahora es qué tan bien se conocen entre sí y qué tan bien se conocen realmente a sí mismos.

programme.title: La Mujer que Hablaba con Los Muertos
programme.desc: Es un film de Terror. Cuando Elena Castaño era una niña, tenía un don: era capaz de comunicarse con los espíritus de los muertos... pero esa capacidad desapareció al crecer. Ahora, Elena y su hermana Úrsula viven de las rentas del pasado, organizando falsas sesiones de espiritismo en las que embaucan a los incautos. Elena, harta de esa vida, ha decidido que esta noche celebrará su última sesión. Todo está dispuesto, solo que hay un invitado de más... un invitado al que nadie esperaba. A la hora de afrontar la historia, hemos tenido en cuenta miles de filias: desde los cuentos de fantasmas de M.R. James hasta "Diez Negritos”, de Agatha Christie, pasando por “Posesión Infernal”, “La Trama” (la de Hitchcock, claro) o “En Bandeja de Plata”, de Billy Wilder. La idea era hacer un largometraje con el que la gente se divierta pasando miedo. Que se rían justo antes de saltar del susto, para después volver a reírse.
